description: Properties are the characteristics that define a node such as temp, humidity, etc.

id.description: A unique id that is a) made up of A-Z, _, and 0-9 and b) starts with a capital letter, and c) max lenght is 30

name.description: This is the human readable name of this property such as Cool Setpoint. If there's an NLS file, this may be translated

is_settable.description: Whether or not this property can also be set by the user. In the case of set, a command is created using the same UOM and editor

editor.description: Editors help the UI with constraints ...

hide.description: (Optional) Set to T or True, hides status in views but is available in program conditions
